tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RobotMaintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RobotModels (
  model_id INT,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  launch_date DATE,
  production_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE RobotMaintenanceLog (
    maintenance_id SERIAL,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RobotErrors (
    error_id SERIAL,
    robot_id INT,
    error_type VARCHAR,
    error_code INT,
    error_description TEXT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE RobotTasks (
    task_id SERIAL,
    robot_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR,
    task_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RobotCalibrationData (
    calibration_id SERIAL,
    robot_id INT,
    calibration_type VARCHAR,
    calibration_value FLOAT,
    calibration_date DATE
);
